1.6.name: wordpress/webfinger-profile
1.6.description:
This plugin allows you to display a widget on your blog with the profile information from any website that supports the WebFinger protocol. (Specifically tested with Diaspora.org, Status.net, Friendika.com)

Webfinger: http://code.google.com/p/webfinger/ simple-web-discovery: http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-jones-simple-web-discovery
